title: Bring back Keith
body: Seriously Liquid, Piglet is not working.

replies.body:
Keith has a 6-2 record?  So they decide to scrim a lot more times so they can lock in 2-8 with a different carry it's weird.  Why not work the team around a more limited schedule if it puts you on pace for #1 seed in Worlds...

I think Piglet is amazing, but there's still something wrong with how he works on Team Liquid.  If his presence means both solo laners are gonna play like shit it's not worth it.

Keith doesn't work. He cannot practice full time and he can't meet the scrim schedule.
Also, their recent performance is not Piglets fault. Of the Last 6 games Fenix and Quas have really under-performed.

tl;dr Stop blaming Piglet for the whole teams short comings.
[Xpecial enjoys Piglet](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2PgaOCTgaA4)

Piglet is past his golden age

he should have just retired and let his mark on Esports history

but he got greedy, in real life
